name: Environmental Station Alpha
summary: Environmental Station Alpha is a 2015 metroidvania created by Finnish indie developer Arvi Teikari (who goes under the name Hempuli). The player character is a robot who must examine a vast bio-dome space station which was mysteriously abandoned, despite still emitting life-signs.
info:
• 中文名: 环境站阿尔法
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Metroidvania
  • 游玩人数: 单人
  • 发行日期: 2015年4月22日
